title: Portfolio
intro-text: Hello, my name is Erni Tabash, a developer focused on web solutions with experience in a wide range of technologies. I am 29 years old and reside in Limón, Costa Rica. I specialize in creating intuitive and efficient user experiences, mainly oriented towards the B2B market.
frameworks-expert: I have extensive experience in development using Node.js, React, Angular, and Next.js, which has allowed me to build robust and efficient applications.
database-expertise: My advanced SQL skills range from effective database management to generating specialized reports, especially in critical environments such as financial institutions.
api-development: I have ventured into basic API development using Java Spring Boot, allowing me to create effective and secure interfaces for system communication.
version-control: My expertise in Git is outstanding, with solid skills in commits and merges, ensuring precise and efficient source code control throughout the development cycle.
experience-summary: I am a fullstack developer with experience, merging backend efficiency with frontend elegance. My journey reflects robust solutions and exceptional user experiences.
scrum-description: Participation in significant projects, including a project with Totem using the Scrum methodology.
collaboration-description: Collaboration with company founders and experience working both in teams and independently.
github-description: I optimize my trajectory on GitHub with a strong online presence, showcasing my professionalism.
linkedin-description: With firm plans to expand my presence on professional networks, I strengthen my reach and strategic connections.
goal-description: Currently, my focus is on providing web solutions with outstanding UX-UI design. My short-term goal is to combine my work in a company with developing my own business. I am open to various industries but have a special interest in technological innovation within the aviation industry.
